# Business Context (for LLM understanding)

## About Travel&Enjoyed
Travel&Enjoyed is a business in the travel and tourism industry.

## Target Audience
- Luxury Vacation Seekers
- Family Adventure Planners
- Newlywed Travelers
- Retiree Globetrotters

## Industry
travel and tourism
